header: Bitcoin Self-Custody Wallet: The right way to own Bitcoin sksksksk
body: A self-custodial wallet, also known as a non-custodial or self-hosted wallet, is a type of digital wallet that allows users to have complete control over their private keys and, consequently, their digital assets.
